item.title: Two-Bucket Finance
item.description:
Summary: Run two parallel tracks: long-term investing and an emergency buffer. Automate both.

Bucket A: Long-term

  • Recurring investment into a broad ETF (e.g., VWCE) via automation.

Bucket B: Emergency buffer

  • Separate emergency savings target range.
  • Keeps shocks from becoming existential.

Rule

Start small, automate early, refine later.

item.title: Fiancée: Chosen Presence, Co-Building & Domestic Stability
item.description:
Summary: Provides domestic stability through chosen presence, not supervision. Co-builder in practical projects. Trust-based partnership (no surveillance). The bond is love, closeness, and co-creation, not “lifeboat” dynamics.

Context

Together since 10 May 2019. She knows everything that matters.

How we operate (treaty)

  • She doesn’t read the Council chats directly unless I show her something.
  • I share what’s relevant. She shares her read of reality.
  • Partnership without secrecy, without surveillance.

Function

  • Domestic stability partner (presence-based support)
  • Co-conspirator on practical projects
  • Social connector (reads people, gathers signals)
  • Reflects me in a way I can actually receive

Third Layer Connection

Boxing together as a Third Layer catalyst.

item.title: Anchor Decision: PostNL as Fortress Base
item.description:
Summary: Chose PostNL mail-sorting job as low-cognitive-overhead anchor to create psychic and financial space for the rebuild.

Context

After unemployment and volatility, this became the stability scaffold. Started November 25, 2025.

Function

Fortress Base: low complexity, high stability. Funds the rebuild. Reduces volatility. Creates space for sovereign construction.

Operational constraints (real)

  • Both of us (István + Ella) work the same shifts as a non-negotiable boundary.
  • Morning-shift realities acknowledged (early start, routine load).
  • Restructure risk exists (morning shift may change end of 2026). This remains “platform, not destination.”

item.title: Fortress Base: Low-Complexity Stability
item.description:
Summary: Build a ‘Fortress Base’ job (low complexity, high stability) that funds the rebuild and reduces volatility.

Principle

A Fortress Base provides low-cognitive-overhead anchor employment. It creates psychic and financial space for sovereign construction.

Current Implementation

PostNL mail sorting — started November 25, 2025 (direct contract). Platform job: not the destination, the launchpad.

Operational reality

  • Shift alignment with partner is treated as governance (same shifts, no exceptions).
  • This base funds the build (car, investing automation, boxing, housing options).
  • Known risk: restructure end-of-2026 timeframe. Plan assumes adaptation.
